entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 04:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -27.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -29.8°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
